means: 守财奴，吝啬鬼( miser的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Misers put their back and their belly into their pockets.
sentence.Network_cn: 守财奴爱财如命,宁可饿肚皮,没衣穿.

sentence.Network_en: Misers put their back and belly into their pockets.
sentence.Network_cn: 守财奴宁肯挨饿受冻也舍不得花钱.

sentence.Network_en: Misers thrive on money and contempt.
sentence.Network_cn: 金钱和鄙薄,才是守财奴的养料.

PerfectNetExp.abs: misers thrive on money and contempt .金钱和鄙薄，才是守财奴的养料。
Cowards call themselves cautious and misers thrifty ., 胆小鬼说自己谨慎 , 守财奴称自己节俭.

list.abs: 看到孤星泪 (Les Miserable) 的灯箱，当下我也想感受一下在著名歌剧院欣赏歌剧的感觉，便马上走进票务处购票了。在英国看歌剧很 …
骨生成 in English,... ... 红血球生成 erythropoiesis 贱骨头 miserable wretch;contemptible individual 胫骨 tibia.
...生存和尊严将永远只能以悲剧收场原来韩国也有像法国悲惨世界(Miserable World)一样的黑暗期

entry.def: If you say that someone is a miser, you disapprove of them because they seem to hate spending money, and to spend as little as possible.

auth_sentence.content: Some old people talk all day; others become misers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some old people talk all day; others become misers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some old people talk all day; others become misers.

auth_sentence.content: Incredibly, the city of angels is among the top gas misers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Incredibly, the city of angels is among the top gas misers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Incredibly, the city of angels is among the top gas misers.

auth_sentence.content: We cannot be like misers who save just for the sake of saving more.
auth_sentence.res_content: We cannot be like misers who save just for the sake of saving more.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We cannot be like misers who save just for the sake of saving more.
